sentences.english: Clears the Clipboard and then places nonpersistent data on it.
sentences.chinese: 清除剪貼簿，然後將非永續性資料置於其中。

sentences.english: Taking protection of the re-sources as priority, guarantee the permanent utilization of the resources.
sentences.chinese: 以資源保護爲前提，保證資源的永續利用。

sentences.english: Land use was also match for the sustainability nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 對於土地的利用方式，則契合當今永續利用的概念。

sentences.english: The utilization of agricultural land has been in accordance with conservation and ecological environment to cope with the trend of sustainable utilization.
sentences.chinese: 農業用地符合保育利用及生態環境之永續利用趨勢。

sentences.english: Perpetual Inventory Method is the basic tool for capital stock accounting.
sentences.chinese: 永續盤存法是資本存量覈算的基本工具。

sentences.english: Team spirit- be whole-hearted, and emphasize team work.
sentences.chinese: 團結是指齊心齊力，重視團隊合作，以達永續經營。

sentences.english: The bio-diesel is a clean energy with environmental friendly and sustainable development feature.
sentences.chinese: 生質柴油是一項兼具環保友善及永續發展的潔淨能源。

sentences.english: Recognizing this, Permaculture teaches Pattern Literacy and Pattern Application.
sentences.chinese: 認知到這一點，樸門永續設計也教授模式語言與應用。

sentences.english: The accounting recording procedures are different under the periodic inventory system and the perpetual inventory system .
sentences.chinese: 定期盤存制和永續盤存制的會計入賬程序是不同的。

sentences.english: It is, in a sense, a perpetual zero coupon bond.
sentences.chinese: 從某意義來說，黃金是一種永續的零息債券。

sentences.english: This system is called perpetual inventory system .
sentences.chinese: 這個制度是所謂的永續盤存制度。

definition: to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to construct (often sth abstract, such as good relations)/to set up/to develop/construction (abstract)/architecture
environmental protection/environmentally friendly/abbr. for 環境保護|环境保护[huan2 jing4 bao3 hu4]
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
to live in peace and work happily (idiom)
